  "Allegations" : "CLAIMANTS ARE OR WERE CLIENTS OF NEUBERGER BERMAN LLC (\"NEUBERGER\").  BETWEEN JANUARY 2005 AND DECEMBER 2007, CLAIMANTS INVESTED IN CERTAIN STRUCTURED NOTES ISSUED BY LEHMAN BROTHERS AND LEHMAN BROTHERS PRIVATE EQUITY FUNDS (COLLECTIVELY, THE \"SECURITIES\"). WHILE MEMBERS OF SENIOR MANAGEMENT WERE NAMED AS RESPONDENTS, AT NO TIME DID THEY HAVE DIRECT RESPONSIBILITY FOR CLAIMANTS' ACCOUNTS.  NEUBERGER HAS FILED AN ANSWER DENYING THE SUBSTANCE OF THE MATERIAL ALLEGATIONS AND BELIEVES IT HAS A MERITORIOUS DEFENSE TO ALL CLAIMS.",
